channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Sumologic Publisher Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Sumologic Publisher Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-37959|2024-08-02T17:23:27.887Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sumologic%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Sumologic Publisher Plugin 2.2.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-37958|2024-08-02T17:23:27.820Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sumologic%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Sumologic Publisher Plugin 2.2.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL.
